import React,{Fragment}from 'react' import Moment from 'react-moment'; const ExperienceList = ({experience}) => { const ExperienceList=experience.map(exp=>{ return( {exp.company} {exp.title} {exp.from}-{' '}{exp.to===null?('NOW'):({exp.to})} ) }) return (

Experience Credentials

{experienceList}
Company Title Years
) } export default ExperienceList
